channel.title: PK server, what's the idea behind them?
channel.description: I've always done economy servers, or allstarts which are just max out on everything and not give a love. What's in a pk server? What should I do to keep my users entertained? I would assume after X hours of pk, they'd bail..

item.title: PK server, what's the idea behind them?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Would you like me to write up some stuff for you?

If you feel like writing it up, sure

asshole_rule:

PvP minigames maybe

Could use CW base, and the underground tunnels for that.

Read full topic
item.source: PK server, what's the idea behind them?

item.title: PK server, what's the idea behind them?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:478225”][quote author=Int Bauk link=topic=596424.msg4199808#msg4199808 date=1358023601]

[ul][li]make it slightly harder then the average pk server[/li]
[li]don’t make it a spawn server[/li]
[li]kill streak, rewards, randomized pvp loots, pk highscores, double pk point weekend[/li]
[li]1 or 2 pk points per kill[/li]
[li]don’t make items ridiculously hard to get[/li]
[li]lots of locations to pk[/li]
[li]bosses & revenants in wilderness[/li]
[li]add a good clan chat system[/li]
[li]medium economy[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

[/quote]
I was thinking of doing a 100% PK server, like how runescape used to have the pk worlds (still do ??). But there would be remote locations (islands, banks, etc) where you could chat, skill, buy stuff, dice, etc.[/quote]

PvP minigames maybe

Read full topic
item.source: PK server, what's the idea behind them?
